- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Harry, Sounds good. Thanks for keeping me in the loop and let me know if I can help. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Harry Parsons [mailto:harrygparsons@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2012 11:16 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: SNC Lavalin_Harry Parsons_MBO Agreement Mark got back to me, the contract changes are the only things left Mark is trying to work with legal to get an OK since it is a change from their standard.
Harry Sent from my iPod On Apr 4, 2012, at 12:45, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Hi Harry, I have not heard back yet but I will politely ping them again. I agree they are probably just waiting on the results before responding. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Harry Parsons [mailto:harrygparsons@gmail.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2012 8:00 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: SNC Lavalin_Harry Parsons_MBO Agreement Good morning Sara, Following up since this is my first time with MBO...I believe I've jumped all the hurdles in front of me so far, if I missed any let me know. I left a voicemail with Mark Best yesterday just before lunch to follow up and see if there were any questions on SNC's side. Was there any comment on the contract changes? I am assuming I'm also waiting on drug screening and background check results. Thanks for all your help in this process. Harry Parsons973-296-4631On Thu, Mar 29, 2012 at 4:07 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Mark, On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. I have reviewed the agreement and enclosed the revised version with our information and suggested changes. Here are the list of changes and explination for each one: - 2nd Paragraph - Due to our role as an employer or record for tax purposes and not that of a staffing agency we have not vetted the skills of the subcontraor thus, we need to put “to the best of our knowelege” in this section. - Section 3 – Since you will remit paymen to us once your client remits payment to you we would like to ask what the net payment terms are that you have in place with your client? - Section 5 Indemnity - We prefer to use our standard indemnity language. If you are curious about MBO Partners and what we do and how we work, we have a short one page overview that may answer some of your questions, which you may access by going here.I look forward to working with you, Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
